trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory - Samples
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory - Samples

trans-unit.source: Provides details about samples that ship with the Azure Data Factory service.
trans-unit.target: Provides details about samples that ship with the Azure Data Factory service.

trans-unit.source: You can quickly deploy, review, and test an Azure Data Factory sample using the Sample pipelines blade in the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: You can quickly deploy, review, and test an Azure Data Factory sample using the Sample pipelines blade in the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: Create a new data factory or open an existing data factory.
trans-unit.target: Create a new data factory or open an existing data factory.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Getting started with Azure Data Factory[data-factory-get-started]</linkText><title></title> for steps to create a data factory.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Getting started with Azure Data Factory[data-factory-get-started]</linkText><title></title> for steps to create a data factory.

trans-unit.source: In the DATA FACTORY blade for the data factory, click the Sample pipelines tile.
trans-unit.target: In the DATA FACTORY blade for the data factory, click the Sample pipelines tile.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Sample pipelines tile</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Sample pipelines tile</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Sample pipelines blade, click the sample that you want to deploy.
trans-unit.target: In the Sample pipelines blade, click the sample that you want to deploy.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Sample pipelines blade</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Sample pipelines blade</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Specify configuration settings for the sample.
trans-unit.target: Specify configuration settings for the sample.

trans-unit.source: For example, your Azure storage account name and account key, Azure SQL server name, database, User ID, and password, etc...
trans-unit.target: For example, your Azure storage account name and account key, Azure SQL server name, database, User ID, and password, etc...

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Sample blade</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Sample blade</linkText>

trans-unit.source: After you are done with specifying the configuration settings, click Create to create/deploy the sample pipelines and linked services/tables used by the pipelines.
trans-unit.target: After you are done with specifying the configuration settings, click Create to create/deploy the sample pipelines and linked services/tables used by the pipelines.

trans-unit.source: You will see the status of deployment on the sample tile you clicked earlier on the Sample pipelines blade.
trans-unit.target: You will see the status of deployment on the sample tile you clicked earlier on the Sample pipelines blade.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Deployment status</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Deployment status</linkText>

trans-unit.source: When you see the Deployment succeeded message on the tile for the sample, close the Sample pipelines blade.
trans-unit.target: When you see the Deployment succeeded message on the tile for the sample, close the Sample pipelines blade.

trans-unit.source: On DATA FACTORY blade, you will see that linked services, data sets, and pipelines are added to your data factory.
trans-unit.target: On DATA FACTORY blade, you will see that linked services, data sets, and pipelines are added to your data factory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Data Factory blade</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Data Factory blade</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The following table provides brief description of the samples available in the Sample pipelines tile.
trans-unit.target: The following table provides brief description of the samples available in the Sample pipelines tile.

trans-unit.source: Sample name
trans-unit.target: Sample name

trans-unit.source: description
trans-unit.target: description

trans-unit.source: Gaming customer profiling
trans-unit.target: Gaming customer profiling

trans-unit.source: Contoso is a gaming company that creates games for multiple platforms: game consoles, hand held devices, and personal computers (PCs).
trans-unit.target: Contoso is a gaming company that creates games for multiple platforms: game consoles, hand held devices, and personal computers (PCs).

trans-unit.source: Each of these games produces tons of logs.
trans-unit.target: Each of these games produces tons of logs.

trans-unit.source: Contoso’s goal is to collect and analyze the logs produced by these games to get usage information, identify up-sell and cross-sell opportunities, develop new compelling features etc... to improve business and provide better experience to customers.
trans-unit.target: Contoso’s goal is to collect and analyze the logs produced by these games to get usage information, identify up-sell and cross-sell opportunities, develop new compelling features etc... to improve business and provide better experience to customers.

trans-unit.source: This sample collects sample logs, processes and enriches them with reference data, and transforms the data to evaluate the effectiveness of a marketing campaign that Contoso has recently launched.
trans-unit.target: This sample collects sample logs, processes and enriches them with reference data, and transforms the data to evaluate the effectiveness of a marketing campaign that Contoso has recently launched.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>GitHub Azure-DataFactory repository</linkText><title></title> contains several samples that help you quickly ramp up with Azure Data Factory service (or) modify the scripts and use it in own application.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>GitHub Azure-DataFactory repository</linkText><title></title> contains several samples that help you quickly ramp up with Azure Data Factory service (or) modify the scripts and use it in own application.

trans-unit.source: The Samples\JSON folder contains JSON snippets for common scenarios.
trans-unit.target: The Samples\JSON folder contains JSON snippets for common scenarios.

trans-unit.source: We would really appreciate your feedback on this article.
trans-unit.target: We would really appreciate your feedback on this article.

trans-unit.source: Please take a few minutes to submit your feedback via <linkText>email</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Please take a few minutes to submit your feedback via <linkText>email</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: data-factory-get-started.md#CreateDataFactory
trans-unit.target: data-factory-get-started.md#CreateDataFactory
